pageContext.claim: “Canada has treated our Agricultural business and Farmers very poorly for a very long period of time. Highly restrictive on Trade! They must open their markets and take down their trade barriers! They report a really high surplus on trade with us. Do Timber & Lumber in U.S.?”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often focuses on trade in goods and leaves out trade in services. Factoring both in, the United States actually had a trade surplus of $8.4 billion with Canada in 2017, according to the Office of the U.S. Trade Representative.
